product_name: Marmot Speedri Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Marmot Speedri jacket offers excellent protection from wind, rain and other harsh conditions, letting you hit the trails in weather that keeps everyone else hiding inside. Reliable MemBrain(R) FusionDri three-layer breathable waterproof nylon blocks rain and wind while remaining breathable thanks to a 3-D backer that sits just off the skin. 100% taped seams offer complete protection. Attached adjustable hood features a laminated wire brim that shields your face from precipitation; adjustable sleeve cuffs are asymmetrical to optimize coverage. Two zippered hand pockets and one zippered chest pocket offer secure storage. Integrated cooling vents allow for temperature regulation in varying conditions. The Marmot Speedri jacket features Angel-wing Movement(TM) sleeves that allow unrestricted arm motion so the jacket won't ride up. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Marmot Speedri jacket offers excellent protection from wind, rain and other harsh conditions, letting you hit the trails in weather that keeps everyone else hiding inside.
